044import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.AdminProtos;
045import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.AdminProtos.CloseRegionResponse;
046import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.AdminProtos.GetOnlineRegionResponse;
047import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.AdminProtos.GetServerInfoResponse;
048import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.AdminProtos.ServerInfo;

059import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.HBaseProtos.NameInt64Pair;
060import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.MapReduceProtos.ScanMetrics;
061import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.MasterProtos.EnableCatalogJanitorResponse;
062import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.MasterProtos.RunCatalogScanResponse;
063import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.MasterProtos.RunCleanerChoreResponse;
064import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.shaded.protobuf.generated.RegionServerStatusProtos.GetLastFlushedSequenceIdResponse;

066/**
067 * Helper utility to build protocol buffer responses, or retrieve data from protocol buffer
068 * responses.
069 */
070@InterfaceAudience.Private
071public final class ResponseConverter {
072  private static final Logger LOG = LoggerFactory.getLogger(ResponseConverter.class);
073
074  private ResponseConverter() {
075  }
076
077  // Start utilities for Client
078  public static SingleResponse getResult(final ClientProtos.MutateRequest request,
079    final ClientProtos.MutateResponse response, final CellScanner cells) throws IOException {
080    SingleResponse singleResponse = new SingleResponse();
081    SingleResponse.Entry entry = new SingleResponse.Entry();
082    entry.setResult(ProtobufUtil.toResult(response.getResult(), cells));
083    entry.setProcessed(response.getProcessed());
084    singleResponse.setEntry(entry);
085    return singleResponse;
086  }
087
088  /**
089   * Get the results from a protocol buffer MultiResponse
090   * @param request  the original protocol buffer MultiRequest
091   * @param response the protocol buffer MultiResponse to convert
092   * @param cells    Cells to go with the passed in <code>proto</code>. Can be null.
093   * @return the results that were in the MultiResponse (a Result or an Exception).
094   */
095  public static org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.MultiResponse getResults(final MultiRequest request,
096    final MultiResponse response, final CellScanner cells) throws IOException {
097    return getResults(request, null, response, cells);
098  }
099
100  /**
101   * Get the results from a protocol buffer MultiResponse
102   * @param request  the original protocol buffer MultiRequest
103   * @param indexMap Used to support RowMutations/CheckAndMutate in batch
104   * @param response the protocol buffer MultiResponse to convert
105   * @param cells    Cells to go with the passed in <code>proto</code>. Can be null.
106   * @return the results that were in the MultiResponse (a Result or an Exception).
107   */
108  public static org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.MultiResponse getResults(final MultiRequest request,
109    final Map<Integer, Integer> indexMap, final MultiResponse response, final CellScanner cells)
110    throws IOException {
111    int requestRegionActionCount = request.getRegionActionCount();
112    int responseRegionActionResultCount = response.getRegionActionResultCount();
113    if (requestRegionActionCount != responseRegionActionResultCount) {
114      throw new IllegalStateException("Request mutation count=" + requestRegionActionCount
115        + " does not match response mutation result count=" + responseRegionActionResultCount);
116    }
117
118    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.MultiResponse results =
119      new org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.MultiResponse();
120
121    for (int i = 0; i < responseRegionActionResultCount; i++) {
122      RegionAction actions = request.getRegionAction(i);
123      RegionActionResult actionResult = response.getRegionActionResult(i);
124      HBaseProtos.RegionSpecifier rs = actions.getRegion();
125      if (
126        rs.hasType()
127          && (rs.getType() != HBaseProtos.RegionSpecifier.RegionSpecifierType.REGION_NAME)
128      ) {
129        throw new IllegalArgumentException(
130          "We support only encoded types for protobuf multi response.");
131      }
132      byte[] regionName = rs.getValue().toByteArray();
133
134      if (actionResult.hasException()) {
135        Throwable regionException = ProtobufUtil.toException(actionResult.getException());
136        results.addException(regionName, regionException);
137        continue;
138      }
139
140      if (actions.getActionCount() != actionResult.getResultOrExceptionCount()) {
141        throw new IllegalStateException("actions.getActionCount=" + actions.getActionCount()
142          + ", actionResult.getResultOrExceptionCount=" + actionResult.getResultOrExceptionCount()
143          + " for region " + actions.getRegion());
144      }
145
146      // For RowMutations/CheckAndMutate action, if there is an exception, the exception is set
147      // at the RegionActionResult level and the ResultOrException is null at the original index
148      Integer index = (indexMap == null ? null : indexMap.get(i));
149      if (index != null) {
150        // This RegionAction is from a RowMutations/CheckAndMutate in a batch.
151        // If there is an exception from the server, the exception is set at
152        // the RegionActionResult level, which has been handled above.
153        if (actions.hasCondition()) {
154          results.add(regionName, index, getCheckAndMutateResult(actionResult, cells));
155        } else {
156          results.add(regionName, index, getMutateRowResult(actionResult, cells));
157        }
158        continue;
159      }
160
161      if (actions.hasCondition()) {
162        for (ResultOrException roe : actionResult.getResultOrExceptionList()) {
163          Result result = null;
164          Result r = ProtobufUtil.toResult(roe.getResult(), cells);
165          if (!r.isEmpty()) {
166            result = r;
167          }
168          results.add(regionName, roe.getIndex(),
169            new CheckAndMutateResult(actionResult.getProcessed(), result));
170        }
171      } else {
172        if (actionResult.hasProcessed()) {
173          for (ResultOrException roe : actionResult.getResultOrExceptionList()) {
174            Result result = actionResult.getProcessed()
175              ? ProtobufUtil.EMPTY_RESULT_EXISTS_TRUE
176              : ProtobufUtil.EMPTY_RESULT_EXISTS_FALSE;
177            Result r = ProtobufUtil.toResult(roe.getResult(), cells);
178            if (!r.isEmpty()) {
179              r.setExists(true);
180              result = r;
181            }
182            results.add(regionName, roe.getIndex(), result);
183          }
184          continue;
185        }
186        for (ResultOrException roe : actionResult.getResultOrExceptionList()) {
187          Object responseValue;
188          if (roe.hasException()) {
189            responseValue = ProtobufUtil.toException(roe.getException());
190          } else if (roe.hasResult()) {
191            responseValue = ProtobufUtil.toResult(roe.getResult(), cells);
192          } else if (roe.hasServiceResult()) {
193            responseValue = roe.getServiceResult();
194          } else {
195            responseValue = ProtobufUtil.EMPTY_RESULT_EXISTS_TRUE;
196          }
197          results.add(regionName, roe.getIndex(), responseValue);
198        }
199      }
200    }
201
202    if (response.hasRegionStatistics()) {
203      ClientProtos.MultiRegionLoadStats stats = response.getRegionStatistics();
204      for (int i = 0; i < stats.getRegionCount(); i++) {
205        results.addStatistic(stats.getRegion(i).getValue().toByteArray(), stats.getStat(i));
206      }
207    }
208
209    return results;
210  }
211
212  private static CheckAndMutateResult getCheckAndMutateResult(RegionActionResult actionResult,
213    CellScanner cells) throws IOException {
214    Result result = null;
215    if (actionResult.getResultOrExceptionCount() > 0) {
216      // Get the result of the Increment/Append operations from the first element of the
217      // ResultOrException list
218      ResultOrException roe = actionResult.getResultOrException(0);
219      if (roe.hasResult()) {
220        Result r = ProtobufUtil.toResult(roe.getResult(), cells);
221        if (!r.isEmpty()) {
222          result = r;
223        }
224      }
225    }
226    return new CheckAndMutateResult(actionResult.getProcessed(), result);
227  }
228
229  private static Result getMutateRowResult(RegionActionResult actionResult, CellScanner cells)
230    throws IOException {
231    if (actionResult.getProcessed()) {
232      Result result = null;
233      if (actionResult.getResultOrExceptionCount() > 0) {
234        // Get the result of the Increment/Append operations from the first element of the
235        // ResultOrException list
236        ResultOrException roe = actionResult.getResultOrException(0);
237        Result r = ProtobufUtil.toResult(roe.getResult(), cells);
238        if (!r.isEmpty()) {
239          r.setExists(true);
240          result = r;
241        }
242      }
243      if (result != null) {
244        return result;
245      } else {
246        return ProtobufUtil.EMPTY_RESULT_EXISTS_TRUE;
247      }
248    } else {
249      return ProtobufUtil.EMPTY_RESULT_EXISTS_FALSE;
250    }
251  }
252
253  /**
254   * Create a CheckAndMutateResult object from a protocol buffer MutateResponse
255   * @return a CheckAndMutateResult object
256   */
257  public static CheckAndMutateResult getCheckAndMutateResult(
258    ClientProtos.MutateResponse mutateResponse, CellScanner cells) throws IOException {
259    boolean success = mutateResponse.getProcessed();
260    Result result = null;
261    if (mutateResponse.hasResult()) {
262      result = ProtobufUtil.toResult(mutateResponse.getResult(), cells);
263    }
264    return new CheckAndMutateResult(success, result);
265  }
266
267  /**
268   * Wrap a throwable to an action result.
269   * @return an action result builder
270   */
271  public static ResultOrException.Builder buildActionResult(final Throwable t) {
272    ResultOrException.Builder builder = ResultOrException.newBuilder();
273    if (t != null) builder.setException(buildException(t));
274    return builder;
275  }
276
277  /**
278   * Wrap a throwable to an action result.
279   * @return an action result builder
280   */
281  public static ResultOrException.Builder buildActionResult(final ClientProtos.Result r) {
282    ResultOrException.Builder builder = ResultOrException.newBuilder();
283    if (r != null) builder.setResult(r);
284    return builder;
285  }
286
287  /** Returns NameValuePair of the exception name to stringified version os exception. */
288  public static NameBytesPair buildException(final Throwable t) {
289    NameBytesPair.Builder parameterBuilder = NameBytesPair.newBuilder();
290    parameterBuilder.setName(t.getClass().getName());
291    parameterBuilder.setValue(ByteString.copyFromUtf8(StringUtils.stringifyException(t)));
292    return parameterBuilder.build();
293  }
294
295  /**
296   * Builds a protocol buffer HasPermissionResponse
297   */
298  public static HasPermissionResponse buildHasPermissionResponse(boolean hasPermission) {
299    HasPermissionResponse.Builder builder = HasPermissionResponse.newBuilder();
300    builder.setHasPermission(hasPermission);
301    return builder.build();
302  }
303
304  // End utilities for Client
305  // Start utilities for Admin
306
307  /**
308   * Get the list of region info from a GetOnlineRegionResponse
309   * @param proto the GetOnlineRegionResponse
310   * @return the list of region info
311   */
312  public static List<RegionInfo> getRegionInfos(final GetOnlineRegionResponse proto) {
313    if (proto == null || proto.getRegionInfoCount() == 0) return null;
314    return ProtobufUtil.getRegionInfos(proto);
315  }
316
317  /**
318   * Check if the region is closed from a CloseRegionResponse
319   * @param proto the CloseRegionResponse
320   * @return the region close state
321   */
322  public static boolean isClosed(final CloseRegionResponse proto) {
323    if (proto == null || !proto.hasClosed()) return false;
324    return proto.getClosed();
325  }
326
327  /**
328   * A utility to build a GetServerInfoResponse.
329   * @return the response
330   */
331  public static GetServerInfoResponse buildGetServerInfoResponse(final ServerName serverName,
332    final int webuiPort) {
333    GetServerInfoResponse.Builder builder = GetServerInfoResponse.newBuilder();
334    ServerInfo.Builder serverInfoBuilder = ServerInfo.newBuilder();
335    serverInfoBuilder.setServerName(ProtobufUtil.toServerName(serverName));
336    if (webuiPort >= 0) {
337      serverInfoBuilder.setWebuiPort(webuiPort);
338    }
339    builder.setServerInfo(serverInfoBuilder.build());
340    return builder.build();
341  }
342
343  /**
344   * A utility to build a GetOnlineRegionResponse.
345   * @return the response
346   */
347  public static GetOnlineRegionResponse
348    buildGetOnlineRegionResponse(final List<RegionInfo> regions) {
349    GetOnlineRegionResponse.Builder builder = GetOnlineRegionResponse.newBuilder();
350    for (RegionInfo region : regions) {
351      builder.addRegionInfo(ProtobufUtil.toRegionInfo(region));
352    }
353    return builder.build();
354  }
355
356  /**
357   * Creates a response for the catalog scan request
358   * @return A RunCatalogScanResponse
359   */
360  public static RunCatalogScanResponse buildRunCatalogScanResponse(int numCleaned) {
361    return RunCatalogScanResponse.newBuilder().setScanResult(numCleaned).build();
362  }
363
364  /**
365   * Creates a response for the catalog scan request
366   * @return A EnableCatalogJanitorResponse
367   */
368  public static EnableCatalogJanitorResponse buildEnableCatalogJanitorResponse(boolean prevValue) {
369    return EnableCatalogJanitorResponse.newBuilder().setPrevValue(prevValue).build();
370  }
371
372  /**
373   * Creates a response for the cleaner chore request
374   * @return A RunCleanerChoreResponse
375   */
376  public static RunCleanerChoreResponse buildRunCleanerChoreResponse(boolean ran) {
377    return RunCleanerChoreResponse.newBuilder().setCleanerChoreRan(ran).build();
378  }

380  // End utilities for Admin
381
382  /**
383   * Creates a response for the last flushed sequence Id request
384   * @return A GetLastFlushedSequenceIdResponse
385   */
386  public static GetLastFlushedSequenceIdResponse
387    buildGetLastFlushedSequenceIdResponse(RegionStoreSequenceIds ids) {
388    return GetLastFlushedSequenceIdResponse.newBuilder()
389      .setLastFlushedSequenceId(ids.getLastFlushedSequenceId())
390      .addAllStoreLastFlushedSequenceId(ids.getStoreSequenceIdList()).build();
391  }
392
393  /**
394   * Stores an exception encountered during RPC invocation so it can be passed back through to the
395   * client.
396   * @param controller the controller instance provided by the client when calling the service
397   * @param ioe        the exception encountered
398   */
399  public static void setControllerException(com.google.protobuf.RpcController controller,
400    IOException ioe) {
401    if (controller != null) {
402      if (controller instanceof ServerRpcController) {
403        ((ServerRpcController) controller).setFailedOn(ioe);
404      } else {
405        controller.setFailed(StringUtils.stringifyException(ioe));
406      }
407    }
408  }
409
410  /**
411   * Retreivies exception stored during RPC invocation.
412   * @param controller the controller instance provided by the client when calling the service
413   * @return exception if any, or null; Will return DoNotRetryIOException for string represented
414   *         failure causes in controller.
415   */
416  @Nullable
417  public static IOException getControllerException(RpcController controller) throws IOException {
418    if (controller != null && controller.failed()) {
419      if (controller instanceof ServerRpcController) {
420        return ((ServerRpcController) controller).getFailedOn();
421      } else {
422        return new DoNotRetryIOException(controller.errorText());
423      }
424    }
425    return null;
426  }
427
428  /**
429   * Create Results from the cells using the cells meta data.
430   */
431  public static Result[] getResults(CellScanner cellScanner, ScanResponse response)
432    throws IOException {
433    if (response == null) return null;
434    // If cellscanner, then the number of Results to return is the count of elements in the
435    // cellsPerResult list. Otherwise, it is how many results are embedded inside the response.
436    int noOfResults =
437      cellScanner != null ? response.getCellsPerResultCount() : response.getResultsCount();
438    Result[] results = new Result[noOfResults];
439    for (int i = 0; i < noOfResults; i++) {
440      if (cellScanner != null) {
441        // Cells are out in cellblocks. Group them up again as Results. How many to read at a
442        // time will be found in getCellsLength -- length here is how many Cells in the i'th Result
443        int noOfCells = response.getCellsPerResult(i);
444        boolean isPartial =
445          response.getPartialFlagPerResultCount() > i ? response.getPartialFlagPerResult(i) : false;
446        List<Cell> cells = new ArrayList<>(noOfCells);
447        for (int j = 0; j < noOfCells; j++) {
448          try {
449            if (cellScanner.advance() == false) {
450              // We are not able to retrieve the exact number of cells which ResultCellMeta says us.
451              // We have to scan for the same results again. Throwing DNRIOE as a client retry on
452              // the
453              // same scanner will result in OutOfOrderScannerNextException
454              String msg = "Results sent from server=" + noOfResults + ". But only got " + i
455                + " results completely at client. Resetting the scanner to scan again.";
456              LOG.error(msg);
457              throw new DoNotRetryIOException(msg);
458            }
459          } catch (IOException ioe) {
460            // We are getting IOE while retrieving the cells for Results.
461            // We have to scan for the same results again. Throwing DNRIOE as a client retry on the
462            // same scanner will result in OutOfOrderScannerNextException
463            LOG.error(
464              "Exception while reading cells from result." + "Resetting the scanner to scan again.",
465              ioe);
466            throw new DoNotRetryIOException("Resetting the scanner.", ioe);
467          }
468          cells.add(cellScanner.current());
469        }
470        results[i] = Result.create(cells, null, response.getStale(), isPartial);
471      } else {
472        // Result is pure pb.
473        results[i] = ProtobufUtil.toResult(response.getResults(i));
474      }
475    }
476    return results;
477  }
478
479  public static Map<String, Long> getScanMetrics(ScanResponse response) {
480    Map<String, Long> metricMap = new HashMap<>();
481    if (response == null || !response.hasScanMetrics()) {
482      return metricMap;
483    }
484
485    ScanMetrics metrics = response.getScanMetrics();
486    int numberOfMetrics = metrics.getMetricsCount();
487    for (int i = 0; i < numberOfMetrics; i++) {
488      NameInt64Pair metricPair = metrics.getMetrics(i);
489      if (metricPair != null) {
490        String name = metricPair.getName();
491        Long value = metricPair.getValue();
492        if (name != null && value != null) {
493          metricMap.put(name, value);
494        }
495      }
496    }
497
498    return metricMap;
499  }
500
501  /**
502   * Creates a protocol buffer ClearRegionBlockCacheResponse
503   * @return a ClearRegionBlockCacheResponse
504   */
505  public static AdminProtos.ClearRegionBlockCacheResponse
506    buildClearRegionBlockCacheResponse(final HBaseProtos.CacheEvictionStats cacheEvictionStats) {
507    return AdminProtos.ClearRegionBlockCacheResponse.newBuilder().setStats(cacheEvictionStats)
508      .build();
509  }
510}
